code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:66 year old white f says she is having symptoms of mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous 8 x week, in spite of treatment. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 51.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

content2.Unmatched: be irritating because they are jealous

td.content: s:68 YO female presents with moderate belief that patient is infested with parasites that were injected by coworker because of jealousy for 5 days. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 49.4 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ZYPREXA - 10 mg /day, and ordered Urine toxicology.

content2.Unmatched: moderate belief that patient is infested
